text: Hiya! I'm following the directions on this: <https://blog.HubSpot.com/customers/create-a-full-width-banner> but am getting 2 unresolved errors? 1.) cannot properly resolve module and 2.) 1:24 'module' is disabled in this context. can anyone assist, please? Thank you in advance
